players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and I investigated him. Be careful in your voting."

You: "
"
Diana: "I am the detective and I have identified Bob as the mafioso. He knows this now, so be cautious in your voting."
Charlie: "I am a villager and I don't know who the mafioso is. I will follow Diana's advice and be cautious in my voting."
You: "Be careful, I know who the mafioso is now. I will not reveal my identity but I will support Diana's decisions."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
